commands
Class Command

java.lang.Object
  commands.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
And, CommandList, CommandOneInput, CommandZeroInput, Constant, Difference, Equal, Greater, Less, Make, MathTwoInput, NInputs, NotEqual, OnClick, Or, Pow, Product, Quotient, Remainder, SetXY, Sum, To, Towards, TurtleCommandOneInput
public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object

Command class, has number of parameters and a list of those parameters also holds the left and right children commands for use with the recursive syntax tree.

Author:
Kevin, Carlos
